title: Realizing a high-performance n-type thermogalvanic cell by tailoring thermodynamic equilibrium
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Sungryong Kim, Jin Han Kwon, Yurim Bae, Jeongsu Kim, Taiho Park, Hong Chul Moon
Ionic thermogalvanic cells (TGCs) have attracted interest for their superior thermopower (Î±) compared to electronic systems. To maximize the thermopower and overall device performance, it is necessary to integrate both...
